sentences.english: They passed the dry bed of a rivulet.
sentences.chinese: 他们跨过了一道干涸的河床。

sentences.english: The dry river – bed finds no thanks for its past.
sentences.chinese: 枯竭的河床觉得无需向丰水期表示谢意。

sentences.english: The bed of a river is partly worn away by corrosive action.
sentences.chinese: 河床部分地就是被这种侵蚀作用冲蚀的。

sentences.english: The prospector panned off bits of sand and gravel scooped from the bed of a stream.
sentences.chinese: 探矿者淘选从河床中挖出的少量含金泥砂和沙砾。

sentences.english: The dry river-bed clothes finds no thanks for its past.
sentences.chinese: 枯槁的河床，并不谢谢它的已往。

sentences.english: The brook warbled over its rocky bed.
sentences.chinese: 溪潺潺流过多石的河床。

sentences.english: The dry river- bed find no thanks for its past.
sentences.chinese: 干涸的河床不对它的过往心存任何感激。
2004年的木瓜溪河床和中央山脉。

sentences.english: He made his first-team breakthrough at River Plate earlier this season.
sentences.chinese: 本赛季伊始，他被提升至河床的一线队。

sentences.english: The agronomist suggested growing rice on the dried river bed.
sentences.chinese: 农学家建议在干涸的河床上种水稻。

sentences.english: Gray and white materials within the lake bed are exposed sediments and salt crusts.
sentences.chinese: 河床内部的灰色和白色物质显示出是沉积物和盐结层。

sentences.english: The dry river-my bed finds no thanks for its past.
sentences.chinese: 枯槁的河床，实在不感谢它的过往。

sentences.english: There are many kettle holes of different size and shape on riverbeds.
sentences.chinese: 河床底部还保存有大小不等形态各异的壶穴。

sentences.english: Kalahari: The Great Thirstland Long spells of sparse rains leave riverbeds dry, and little to eat.
sentences.chinese: 稀少雨水的长期循环造成河床干枯，食物非常少。

sentences.english: So instead, they plant lotus seeds on raised beds.
sentences.chinese: 因此他们在升高的河床上种植莲子。

sentences.english: The edge of the incised-valley lacked the sand-gravel bed of the river channel at the bottom.
sentences.chinese: 古河谷的边缘地带，往往缺失底部的河床相砂砾层。

definition: period of low water level (winter in north China)
